author: Redjumpman (Redjumpman#1337)
install_msg: Thank you for installing Hot Potato.
name: Hot Potato
short: Play a game of Hot Potato!
description: Play a game of hot potato where the winner takes all. You can change the table size that gets served, the wait time before starting the game, and the cost to play!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord IDs as needed for operation temporarily during the game which are automatically deleted when it ends.
